title: Serene Vector
description: Une esthétique de design plat sophistiquée caractérisée par une géométrie vectorielle sans contours, des palettes pastel douces et un éclairage diagonal à bords nets distinctif. Ce style évoque le calme moderne grâce à des formes simplifiées, une précision architecturale et une finition mate sans texture, typique des illustrations éditoriales technologiques haut de gamme.
description_en: A sophisticated flat design aesthetic characterized by lineless vector geometry, soft pastel palettes, and distinct hard-edged diagonal lighting. This style evokes modern calm through simplified forms, architectural precision, and a matte, texture-free finish typical of high-end tech editorial illustrations.

prompt: High-fidelity digital vector illustration rendered in a sophisticated, lineless flat design style reminiscent of modern lifestyle editorial art and high-end tech branding. The visual language is constructed from clean, mathematically precise Bézier curves with absolutely no raster noise, grain, or brush texture. The scene features {{subject}} integrated seamlessly into a minimalist environment, filling the frame completely with a full-bleed composition. The rendering technique relies on solid shapes and gradient-free color blocking to define form, eschewing black outlines entirely in favor of contrast-based separation. Lighting is the defining stylistic element: a soft, directional light source (resembling natural window light) casts distinct, hard-edged diagonal geometric shadows across the scene, creating depth through 'multiply-blend' style darkened overlays rather than realistic shading. These shadows cut across surfaces with architectural precision, adding a layer of visual rhythm to the otherwise flat composition. The color palette is strictly curated, utilizing soft, muted pastels and earthy tones, anchored by {{primary_color}} as the dominant environmental hue and {{accent_color}} for focal points and details. The value range is high-key and low-contrast, maintaining a serene, airy atmosphere throughout. Textures are implied through simplified vector patterns (such as repeating geometric shapes for fabrics or foliage) rather than bitmap detail. The {{subject}} is stylized with elegant, simplified anatomy and minimal facial features, prioritizing gesture and silhouette over hyper-realism. The overall mood is {{mood}}, conveyed through the orderly arrangement of elements and the tranquil, static lighting. {{lighting}} enhances the scene with subtle tonal shifts on flat surfaces.
